name: Silent Evil: The Uncanny Statue
description:
the Statue beckons you

You are here now

There is blood on the snow

Seek out the uncanny statue

Get real close to it

And give your self over to it

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Mouse to move camera

Esc to quit game

Space to reset game if you get stuck

(Game will close on it's own when the game is completed)

Cover Image/icon for the game made by my friend @DevyanshiS07 on Twitter
